name: Abjure Enemy

name: Absolute Power

name: Ancient Grudges

description: Touch your amulet to subsume a sliver of the knowledge of the gith. You gain Advantage on aberrations.

name: Arcane Recovery
summary: Arcane Recovery is a Wizard Class Action. This ability allows you to regain half your Wizard level, rounded up, in Spell Slots once per day.
description: Once per day out of combat, you can replenish expended Spell Slots.
notes:
The recovered spell slots must have a combined level that is less than or equal to half your Wizard level (rounded up), with a maximum of a 5th level Spell Slot.
* For example: 
** When a Level 3 Wizard uses Arcane Recovery:
*** The highest Level of Spell Slots that can be recovered is: 3 ÷ 2 = 1.5 ≈ 2
*** The total number of Spell Slots that can be recovered is: two Level 1 Spell Slots or one Level 2 Spell Slot.
** When a Level 5 Wizard uses Arcane Recovery:
*** The highest Level of Spell Slots that can be recovered is: 5 ÷ 2 = 2.5 ≈ 3
*** The total number of Spell Slots that can be recovered is: three Level 1 Spell Slots or one Level 2 Spell Slot and one Level 1 Spell Slot or one Level 3 Spell Slot.

name: Aura of Courage
summary: Aura of Courage is a Paladin Class Action. This ability allows a Paladin to protect their allies from fear.
description: You and any nearby allies can't be Frightened. The aura disappears if you fall Unconscious.

name: Aura of Devotion

Bind to your main hand weapon. Its damage becomes magical, you cannot drop or throw it, and you become Proficient with it if you weren't already.

You can only have 1 pact weapon at any time.


The weapon returns to its previous state if you are more than 1.5m away from it for more than 10 rounds.

description:

Devour Intellect is an Action for Druids who have assumed the form of an Intellect Devourer via Aberrant Shape. Intellect Devourers use this ability to consume the minds of their enemies.

See also: Wild Shape

== Description ==
Consume a creature's mind. If its Stunned. Otherwise, its Intelligence is reduced by 11.

== Properties ==

Action

* melee
* If the target's Intelligence is 4 or higher:
** Reduce Intelligence by 11, to a minimum of 0 (INT negates)
** 2
* If the target's Intelligence is 3 or lower:
** Damage: 2d10|Psychic
** Target is Stunned
** INT to negate both the damage and the Stunned effect

Legacy Content



Horrific Visage was a Sorcerer Action and an Illithid Power available in Early Access. This ability allowed the Sorcerer to regain Sorcery Points while inflicting psychic damage on an enemy.

== Description ==

Release the Eldritch magic within you to terrify a creature with your twisted powers and regain 2 Sorcery Points.

The creature takes another 1d4|Psychic damage per turn.

== Properties ==

Action

* m=9|ft=30
* Long Rest
* Restores 2 Sorcery Points Icons Sorcery Points to the Sorcerer
* INT to negate Horrific Visage

summary: Shield of Thralls is an Action and Volatile Shield}} condition to the character or an ally, granting them 10 [[Hit Points#Temporary Hit Points|temporary hit points. name: Shifting Winds
description: Sweetplum Gales is a Class Action available to Djinni. It allows the user to teleport to a destination that's within view.

name: Slam

Hit a target with your bare fists and infect it with the Crawling Gnaw.

Constructs, elementals, oozes, plants, undead, and members of your adventuring party can't be infected.

name: Slashing Flourish (Melee)

Sneak Attack (Ranged) is a Rogue Action. This ability allows the Rogue to exploit enemies' distraction and deal extra damage to their vulnerable spots with Ranged Weapons.

See also: Sneak Attack (Melee)
description: Deal an extra 1d6 damage to a foe you have Advantage against. You can also use Sneak Attack if you have an ally within 1.5m / 5ft of the target and you don't have Disadvantage.

name: Sphere of Elemental Balance: Acid
summary: This action is a variant of Sphere of Elemental Balance. This variant allows Monks to hurl a globe of acid, dealing Acid damage and creating an Acid Surface.
description: Hurl a sphere of energy that deals 2d8|Acid damage and creates an Acid Surface.

name: Sphere of Elemental Balance: Cold
summary: This action is a variant of Sphere of Elemental Balance. This variant allows Monks to hurl a globe of cold energy, dealing Cold damage and creating an Ice Surface.
description: Hurl a sphere of energy that deals 2d8|Cold damage and creates an Ice Surface.

name: Sphere of Elemental Balance: Fire
summary: This action is a variant of Sphere of Elemental Balance. This variant allows Monks to hurl a ball of fire, dealing Fire damage and creating a Fire Surface.
description: Hurl a sphere of energy that deals 2d8|Fire damage and creates an Fire Surface.

name: Sphere of Elemental Balance: Lightning
summary: This action is a variant of Sphere of Elemental Balance. This variant allows Monks to hurl a ball of electricity, dealing Lightning damage and creating an Electrified Surface.
description: Hurl a sphere of energy that deals 2d8|Lightning damage and creates an Electrified Surface.

name: Sphere of Elemental Balance: Poison
summary: This action is a variant of Sphere of Elemental Balance. This variant allows Monks to hurl an orb of poison, dealing Poison damage and creating a Poison Surface.
description: Hurl poisonous energy that damages the target and creates a bubbling surface to Poisoned (Condition)|Poison creatures.

name: Sphere of Elemental Balance: Thunder
summary: This action is a variant of Sphere of Elemental Balance. This variant allows Monks to hurl a ball of thunder, dealing Thunder damage.
description: Hurl a sphere of energy that deals 3d8|Thunder damage.

name: Spiteful Suffering
summary: Spiteful Suffering is an Action available to those that have chosen the path of the Oathbreaker. This ability allows these Paladins to steep their enemies in darkness, causing necrotic damage and leaving them vulnerable to attacks.
description: Steep an enemy in the darkness that churns within you. The target takes 1d4 + Charisma Modifier|Necrotic damage each turn and Attack Rolls against it have Advantage.

name: Stage Fright
summary: Stage Fright is an Action and Illithid Power. This ability allows the character to inflict a fear of failure on their enemies, causing them to miss more often and take psychic damage.
description:
Your targets have Disadvantage on Attack Rolls and take 2d6|Psychic damage each time they miss.

Targets overcome their Stage Fright early when they succeed on an Attack Roll.

name: Stunning Strike (Melee)
summary: Stunning Strike (Melee) is a Monk Action. This Action allows the Monk to deal damage to enemies with Melee Weapons and possibly Stun them.
description: Spend a ki to deal Weapon Damage and possibly Stunned|Stun the target.

name: Stunning Strike (Unarmed)
summary: Stunning Strike (Unarmed) is a Monk Action. This Action allows the Monk to deal damage to enemies with an Unarmed Strike and possibly Stun them.
description: Spend a ki to deal Unarmed Damage and possibly Stunned|Stun the target.

name: Summon Companion
summary: Summon Companion is a Subclass Feature of Rangers learned immediately upon choosing the Beast Master subclass. This ability allows the Beast Master to call upon their animal companion to fight and aid them in combat.
description: Gain a beast companion that accompanies you on your adventures and fights alongside you.

name: Supreme Sneak
summary: Supreme Sneak is a Thief Action. This ability allows the Thieves to become invisible for a limited amount of time.
description: Blend into the environment so completely that you become Invisible.

name: Survival Instinct
summary: Survival Instinct is a special Action granted by completing the "Help Omeluum Investigate the Parasite" quest. This ability allows the character to save an ally from falling unconscious.
description: Infuse a creature with psionic force. If it reaches 0 Hit Points, it heals instead of falling Unconscious.
notes: * In Early Access, this power was the special Illithid Power granted to Clerics. Instead, the quest given by Omeleum would grant Repulsor.

name: Sweeping Attack
summary: Sweeping Attack is a Class Action using Superiority Dice available to Battle Masters
description: Swing your weapon in a rapid, sweeping arc to attack multiple enemies at once. Roll you superiority die for damage.

name: Sweeping Cinder Strike
summary: PAGENAME is an action that allows the Way of the Four Elements to shoot a flaming cone from their fingertips and deal Fire damage to enemies. This is the Monk's equivalent of Burning Hands.
description: Expel fire from your outstretched hands and ignite anything flammable.

name: Sweetplum Gales
description: Sweetplum Gales is a Class Action available to Djinni. It allows the user to create a whirlwind that Restrains creatures caught inside.

name: Symbiotic Entity
summary:
Symbiotic Entity is a Circle of the Spores Action that consumes one Wild Shape Charge. It grants you temporary hit points, and until they're gone:
* your weapon and unarmed attacks deal additional Necrotic|necrotic damage, and
* you deal double damage with Halo of Spores.
description: Gain Healing|4 Temporary Hit Points per Druid level and deal an additional 1d6|Necrotic damage while you have them. Cast Halo of Spores with double damage.

name: Tentacle Whip (Displacer Beast)
summary: Tentacle Whip is a class action available to Displacer Beasts that allows a creature to deal 2d6 + Strength Modifier|Bludgeoning and 2d6|Piercing damage.
description: Lash out with a sleek, spinous tentacle.

name: Terror Trepan
summary: Terror Trepan is one of Malus Thorm's Class Actions that allows him to attack his target's brain, dealing damage and  Frightened|Frightening them.
description: Bore into a foe's brain and Frightened|Frighten them.

name: Third Eye: Darkvision
summary: Third Eye: Darkvision is a Divination action that gives you the ability to see in the darkness all the way up to m=27|ft=80 (akin to Superior Darkvision) until the next day.
description: You gain the ability to see in the dark out to a range of m=27|ft=80

name: Third Eye: See Invisibility
summary: Third Eye: See Invisibility is a Divination action that gives you the ability to see invisible creatures nearby until Long Rest. It is akin to the spell See Invisibility.
description: Become able to see Invisible creatures, and possibly reveal them to others.

name: This Won't Hurt A Bit
summary: This Won't Hurt A Bit is one of Malus Thorm's Class Actions that allows him to inject a target with a Syringe. He must have his assistant hand him the tool first.
description: Jab a foe with a syringe and Poisoned|Poison them.

name: Tiger's Bloodlust
description:
Lash out to attack up to 3 enemies at once. They each take half the damage your weapon usually deals and start to Bleeding|Bleed.

Available only when Rage|Raging.

name: Topple
description: Swipe at a creature to knock it Prone.

name: Topple the Big Folk
description: Deal additional damage equal to your Proficiency Bonus. On a hit, Large, Huge, or Gargantuan creatures take an additional 2d6|Slashing|drs=t damage and must suceed a Strength or fall Prone.

name: Touch of the Storm
summary: PAGENAME is an Action that allows the Way of the Four Elements to strike nearby enemies with lightning, causing them to be unable to use reactions. This is the Monk's equivalent of Shocking Grasp.
description: The target cannot use reactions. This spell has Advantage on creatures with metal armour.

name: Transfuse Health
summary: Transfuse Health is an Action and Illithid Power. This ability allows the character to heal a target by half the caster's current hit point value.
description: Sacrifice half your remaining hit points to heal a target for the same amount.

name: Trip Attack (Melee)
summary: Trip Attack (Melee) is a Battle Master Action. This combat manoeuvre allows the Fighter to deal damage to enemies with Melee Weapons and possibly knock them Prone.
description:
A powerful attack that possibly knocks the target Prone.

On Miss: Does not spend Superiority Dice.

The target can't be Huge in size.

name: Trip Attack (Ranged)
summary: Trip Attack (Ranged) is a Battle Master Fighter Action. This combat manoeuvre allows the Fighter to deal damage to enemies with Ranged Weapons and possibly knock them Prone.
description:
A powerful shot that possibly knocks the target Prone.

On Miss: Does not spend Superiority Dice.

The target can't be Huge in size.

name: Turn the Faithless
summary: Turn the Faithless is an Action available to Oath of the Ancients. This ability allows the Paladin to make fey and fiends flee from them.
description:
Channel your Oath using ancient words to Turned|Turn nearby fey and fiends.

The condition ends upon taking damage.

name: Turn the Unholy
summary: Turn the Unholy is an Action available to Oath of Devotion. This ability allows these Paladins to make Undead and Fiends(see notes) flee from them.
description:
Turned|Turn nearby fey and fiends. They are forced to flee and cannot come close to you.

The condition ends upon taking damage.

name: Turn Undead
summary: As an action, present your holy symbol and cause undead creatures to flee.
description:
Pray to Turn all undead that can see you.

The condition ends upon taking damage.

name: Umbral Shroud
summary: Umbral Shroud is a Gloom Stalker Action that lets you become Invisible so long as you are enshrouded in shadows.
description:
Area must be Lightly or Heavily Obscured

Wrap yourself in shadows to become Umbral Shroud (Condition)|Invisible if you are obscured.

Invisibility ends early if you attack, cast another spell, take an action, or take damage

name: Unpetrification Ray
summary: Unpetrification Ray is a class action available to Spectators, that allows them to turn a Petrified creature back to its organic form.
description: Turn a Petrified creature back to its organic form.

name: Unrelenting Ferocity
summary: Unrelenting Ferocity is an action available to Wildheart Barbarians with the Rage: Bear Heart bestial heart. This ability allows them to heal themselves while raging.
description:
Muster up your stamina to heal yourself.

Can only be used once per Rage.

name: Unshackling Strike
description: Smite the magical bonds keeping a creature Restrained, Paralysed, and Stunned, freeing it.

name: Venomous Regurgitation
summary: Venomous  Regurgitation is a action available to Thisobald Thorm while he has the condition Toxic Reflux.
description: A sip from the Brewer's special booze causes him to vomit a toxic fluid that can Poisoned|Poison those it hits.

name: Volatile Cluster
summary: Volatile Cluster is a class action available to Yurgir that allows him to toss Orthonic Handbombs at enemies and knock them Prone.
description: Toss a cluster of damaging explosives that can possibly knock nearby creatures Prone.

name: Volley
summary: Volley is a Hunter Class Action. This ability allows Hunters to attack an aoe radius with their ranged attack rather than a single target.
description: Fire a cascade of arrows upon nearby enemies.

name: Water Whip
summary: PAGENAME is an Action that allows a Way of the Four Elements to either knock a target prone, or pull a target towards them.
description: Possibly pulls a target within 9m toward you or knocks it Prone.

name: Weakening Strike
description: Target an enemy's hands with a non-lethal attack and possibly inflict Weak Grip. Creatures without weapons can't have Weak Grip.

name: Weapon Bond
summary: Weapon Bond is an Eldritch Knight action. This prevents the Fighter's main hand weapon from being disarmed and makes it automatically return to the Fighter when thrown.
description: Ritually bind the weapon in your main hand. The weapon can't be knocked out of your hand, and it automatically returns to you when Thrown.

name: Whirlwind Attack
summary: Whirlwind Attack is a Hunter Class Action. This ability allows Hunters to attack an aoe radius with their melee attack rather than a single target.
description: Strike out at all nearby foes, making separate attacks rolls against each target.

name: Whirlwind Attack (Weapon Action)
description: Whirl your body around in a punishing swirl, strike all nearby foes.

name: Wholeness of Body
summary: PAGENAME is an action unique to Class Monk Open Hand Hotbar Icon|Way of the Open Hand, a subclass of Monk, that lets the monk regain Ki Points and have an extra bonus action.
description: Regain half your Ki and enter a temporary state of Wholeness of Body (Condition)|Wholeness where you regain Ki Points and have an extra bonus.

name: Wild Shape
summary:
Wild Shape is an Action gained by Druids at Level 2 that allows them to magically transform into various creatures in order to fight in combat or explore the environment.

See also: Combat Wild Shape, the Circle of the Moon enhanced version with extra exclusive forms.
description:
Magically assume the shape of a beast. While in animal shape, you can't talk or cast Spells.

You can take on the attributes your beast form -- excluding your Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores.

When your beast form drops to 0 Hit Points, you revert to your normal form.

name: Wild Shape: Badger
summary: Wild Shape: Badger is a Wild Shape form available to Druids.
description:
Assume the shape of a giant badger that can Burrow into the ground. The badger has a starting health of Healing|13 hit points that increases every two druid levels.

While in animal shape, you can't talk or cast spells. You take on the attributes of your beast form - excluding your Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores.

When your beast form drops to 0 hit points, you revert to your normal form.

name: Wild Shape: Cat
summary: Wild Shape: Cat is a Wild Shape form available to Druids.
description:
Take the shape of a cat that can avoid attention and Meow to distract enemies. It has Healing|2 hit points.

While in animal shape, you can't talk or cast spells. You take on the attributes of your beast form - excluding your Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores.

When your beast form drops to 0 hit points, you revert to your normal form.

name: Wild Shape: Deep Rothé
summary: Wild Shape: Deep Rothé is a Wild Shape form available to Druids.
description:
Assume the shape of a deep rothé that casts Dancing Lights and Charges its enemies.  The deep rothé has a starting health of Healing|23 hit points that increase every two druid levels.

While in animal shape, you can't talk or cast spells. You take on the attributes of your beast form - excluding your Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores.

When your beast form drops to 0 hit points, you revert to your normal form.

name: Wild Shape: Dilophosaurus
summary: Wild Shape: Dilophosaurus is a Wild Shape form available to Druids.
description: Take the shape of a dilophosaurus whose Corrosive Spit can dissolve a target's Armour Class. Your dilophosaurus shape has a starting health of Healing|74 hit points.

name: Wild Shape: Owlbear
summary: Wild Shape: Owlbear is a Wild Shape form available to Druids.
description:
Take the shape of an Owlbear that can Rupture the ground and become Enrage.

Your owlbear shape has starting health of Healing|65 hit points that increases every two druid levels.

name: Wild Shape: Panther
summary: Wild Shape: Panther is a Wild Shape form available to Druids.
description:
Take the shape of a panther that can Prowl around invisibly. 

Your panther shape has a starting health of Healing|45 hit points that increases every two druid levels.

name: Wild Shape: Spider
summary: Wild Shape: Spider is a Wild Shape form available to Druids.
description:
Assume the shape of of a giant spider that can Enweb enemies. The giant spider has a starting health of Healing|20 hit points that increases every two druid levels.

While in animal shape, you can't talk or cast spells. You take on the attributes of your beast form - excluding your Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores.

You are immune to Enweb, the movement penalty from walking on Webs, and take no falling damage when jumping onto Webs.

name: Wild Shape: Wolf
summary: Wild Shape: Wolf is a Wild Shape form available to Druids.
description:
Assume the shape of a dire wolf that can Incite enemies and Distract enemies. The dire wolf has a starting health of Healing|18 hit points that increase every two druid levels.

While in animal shape, you can't talk or cast spells. You take on the attributes of your beast form - excluding your Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores.

When your beast form drops to 0 hit points, you revert to your normal form.

name: Wolf Companion
summary: Summon Companion: Wolf is a variant of Summon Companion which is a Subclass Feature of Rangers learned immediately upon choosing the Beast Master subclass. This ability allows the Beast Master to call upon their animal companion to fight and aid them in combat.
description: Gain a beast companion that accompanies you on your adventures and fights alongside you.

name: Wolf Spider Companion
summary: Summon Companion: Wolf Spider is a variant of Summon Companion which is a Subclass Feature of Rangers learned immediately upon choosing the Beast Master subclass. This ability allows the Beast Master to call upon their animal companion to fight and aid them in combat.
description: Gain a beast companion that accompanies you on your adventures and fights alongside you.

name: Worg Companion
summary: Like the Summon Companion of the Worg Companion.
description: Gain a beast companion that accompanies you on your adventures and fights alongside you.

name: Wounding Ray (Class Action)
summary: Wounding Ray  is a class action used by Spectators. It allows them to shoot a ray which deals Necrotic damage.
description: Shoot an eye ray that deals immense damage.
